articles.title: Kolkata dancer shot dead during evening walk in Missouri, shares TV actor - India Today
articles.description: Devoleena Bhattacharjee shared on X that Amarnath Ghosh a dancer from Kolkata was shot dead during his evening walk in St Louis Missouri
articles.content:
Bharatnatyam and Kuchupudi dancer from Kolkata, Amarnath Ghosh, has been shot dead in the US, said Devoleena Bhattacharjee, who is known for her role as Gopi Bahu in 'Saath Nibhaana Saathiya'.
